thread.title: Russian politician Alexei Navalny hit with green liquid
thread.title_full: Russian politician Alexei Navalny hit with green liquid

title: Russian politician Alexei Navalny hit with green liquid
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device Russian politician Alexei Navalny hit with green liquid 21 March 2017 Last updated at 10:08 GMT 
Mobile phone footage appears to show Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny being splashed with a green liquid in the street. 
The politician presented a video message on his website after the alleged attack. Read more
